name: Hutsul State
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Culture] from [Pasture] tiles [in all cities] <in [Sheep] tiles>
startIntroPart1: Be healthy, great Opryshok Oleksa Dovbush!Today you had the honor of uniting the Hutsuls, the descendants of the Rus',under your wing, ax and trembita.Among forests and mountains, streams and meadows,the villages of your beautiful people spread out, each village is unique, each village has its own version of your language, and each village is not similar to another, each city is beautiful in its own way, each city is powerful and sacred,but they are all united by the power of God, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
startIntroPart2: Are you ready to face the world and lead your people to the victory?
declaringWar: You encroached on the well-being and will of my people, I will stick my ax in the back of your head, goat!
defeated: Betrayal, hands fell, heart stopped...but on my land, no one has taught your language and will not teach it
introduction: Oh my God, hello, how are you? Come to my house, I'll make you a bed on the stove
hateHello: Go to hell,why you come here at that time?
tradeRequest: Oh hello there, what about deal?

name: Zaporizhian Sich
uniques: [+10]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
startIntroPart1: Have a great day, Bohdan! You were chosen to lead the Cossack family, through the thorny path of survival and freedom, from Polish landlords.Your cossacks and seagulls will be the key to your clan's victory, and your goal is to manage them for success!Don't let us down, Bohdan Khmelnytsky
startIntroPart2: Are you ready to win the freedom for your people?
declaringWar: God saw, I meant well, but the way you behave towards us makes me say only one word... massacre
attacked: You are a treacherous rat, let your ass come apart at the seams
defeated: They will not give the Ukrainian race the will to live and prosper. My poor people... God, why did you leave us!
introduction: Hello stranger, I am Bohdan Khmelnytsky, the Hetman of the Zaporizhian Sich, leader of the Cossack clan. Do not behave hostilely, and you will keep the last healthy teeth in your mouth, hahahahaha!
hateHello: Look at them, our guests have come to ask the hetman for forgiveness on their knees.
tradeRequest: Have the conscience to accept my offer, I tried to make it profitable for everyone equally.

name: The Kyivan Rus
declaringWar: By Perun's mighty hammer! I declare war between our lands! Let my fierce Druzhina and the clash of steel be my roar!
attacked: This treachery shall not pass unanswered! Let my guard march forth, and my mighty siege engines roar, as we crush you like grapes beneath our iron boots!
defeated: Alas, bitter defeat! Our once-proud Kyiv now lie in ruin, like shattered dreams upon the cold earth! But let it be known, we will come back stronger than ever!
introduction: Good Day! What brings you here to my lands? I assume you sailed the Dnieper here for trade!
neutralHello: What brings you to the foot my throne?
hateHello: Begone, foul wretch! May the harsh winds of fate carry you far from my sight!
tradeRequest: Might we, perhaps, enter into a most profitable arrangement? As two ships floating along on the same river?
uniqueText:
[+1 Gold, +1 Happiness] in cities on [River] tiles,
            Roads connect tiles across rivers,
            [Land] units gain the [River Walker] promotion,
            Druzhina military unit uses a unique promotion tree
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Happiness] in cities on [River] tiles

This nation was originally created by [RatInfestation] for the mod [Project Allciv].]

name: Novgorod Republic
declaringWar: Our unyielding strongholds will not falter to one as puny as you, and my cunning armies will unleash their fury upon you!
attacked: I shall throw you into a pitfull of snakes!
defeated: As the sun sets upon beloved Novgorod, I remember fierce battles, and my peoples unwavering faith! Farewell, dear Novgorod, your people will see your glory restored! In time.
introduction: Greetings, I am Alexander Nevsky, Prince of Novgorod, defender of Orthodoxy, bane of the Swedish, and guardian of the lands! My land is beneath the watchful eyes of our saints. Don't step too close.
hateHello: Begone from my borders, lest you wish to taste my vengeance!
tradeRequest: Listen well, ruler, for I, Alexander Nevsky, Prince of Novgorod, have come to propose a trade agreement between our lands!
uniques:
Comment [

This nation was originally created by [RatInfestation] for the mod [Project Allciv].]

name: Russian Tsardom
uniques: [+3 Production] per [3] population [in all cities] <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Tundra] tiles>

name: Serbia
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, all hail Stefan the First-Crowned, King of Serbia! Great and holy Serbia had arisen! No longer are we just the Grand Principality of Serbia. Nay, you are a king! We have a long road ahead of us! We will supplant Byzantium!
startIntroPart2: Your Royal Highness, Serbia calls upon you to lead it to greatness and glory! Will you make Serbia great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your lands will make a glorious addition to the kingdom of Serbia!
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>

name: Belarus
startIntroPart1: Welcome to Belarus, the People Republic!
declaringWar: We're tired of disputes, enough! Prepare for war!
attacked: Are you gonna to grab our lands? Come on, get it!
defeated: You are disgusting! How dare you...
introduction: Hello there, my name is Vaclau, I am presenting Belarus!
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in this exchange?
uniques:
